actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to increase to $900 the minimum amount a parent not having custody of a child must provide for the support of the child in certain cases in order to claim a personal exemption for the child.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to increase from $600 to $900 per calendar year the minimum amount a parent not having custody of such child must provide for the support of a child in order to claim a personal tax exemption for the child.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to increase to $900 the minimum amount a parent not having custody of a child must provide for the support of the child in certain cases in order to claim a personal exemption for the child.
